title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed behavior: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it does not get selected.

Expected behavior: Upon clicking on an item in the library outline view for the first time, it should get selected.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time.
